review: I have a Roku box and a Roku stick. Both loaded in seconds & months later work w/o effort.  Amazon stick arrived 2 months after ordering, constantly froze & timed out on setup.  Amazon stick keep rejecting my password even though it was entered correctly multiple times.  3 days later it accepted my password, but froze again. 4 days later i still couldn't set parental controls. I tried watching a show to test it & it kept freezing, dropping off my network, etc. This never happened w/the Roku stick on that same TV w/the same ultra fast wifi connection.  I plan to return the Amazon stick & reconnect my Roku stick.
